tool_description: Database API. Endpoints offer access to robust database accessibility.
title: Datapi

api_list.name: Send Data
api_list.description: Send or Save data to the backend API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://datapi1.p.rapidapi.com/send/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datapi1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
